entry.title: Twitter Bootstrap alert-box element for CakePHP
entry.content:
So I like the Twitter Bootstrap alerts and I wanted a way to use them in my CakePHP projects when controller actions return flash messages.

Element

app/View/Elements/alert-box.ctp
```html+php

×

```

Usage

The element is used from the controller by appending the element and class to the $this->element() call.
Success
php <?php $this->Session->setFlash(__('The article has been saved'), 'alert-box', array('class'=>'alert-success')); ?>

Failed
php <?php $this->Session->setFlash(__('The article could not be saved. Please, try again.'), 'alert-box', array('class'=>'alert-error')); ?>
